UserAccount.title: UserAccount
UserAccount.description: Stores user account information for the TramitesFacil app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserAccount entity.

email.description: User's email address for login and communication.

creationDate.description: Date and time when the user account was created.

credits.description: The user's current credit balance for general services.

promotionalCredits.description: The user's promotional credit balance, usable for specific services.

ServiceRequest.title: ServiceRequest
ServiceRequest.description: Represents a service request made by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the request.

serviceId.description: The ID of the requested service.

serviceName.description: The name of the requested service.

status.description: The current status of the request.

requestDate.description: The date the request was made.

fileUrl.description: URL of the completed document PDF uploaded by the admin.

formData.description: Key-value pairs of the data submitted by the user for the service request.

adminNotes.description: Optional notes or comments from the administrator regarding the request status (e.g., reason for rejection).

DepositRequest.title: DepositRequest
DepositRequest.description: Represents a deposit request made by a user to add balance.

userId.description: The UID of the user making the request.

userName.description: The name of the user for display in the admin panel.

userEmail.description: The email of the user for display in the admin panel.

trackingKey.description: The unique tracking key from the bank transfer submitted by the user.

amount.description: The amount the user claims to have deposited.

requestDate.description: The date the user submitted the request.

status.description: The status of the deposit request.

definition.description: Stores user account information. Path-based ownership ensures that only the user can access their own data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores all service requests from users. Admins can read/write all, users can only read their own.

params.name: requestId
params.description: The unique identifier for the service request.

definition.description: Stores user-submitted requests to add balance. Admins approve/reject these requests.

params.name: requestId
params.description: The unique identifier for the deposit request.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore structure is designed to support the TramitesFacil app. The 'depositRequests' collection is added to manage the new administrator-approval workflow for balance recharges, which is more secure than the previous pre-registration system. Users submit requests, and admins approve them to credit the balance. Added a 'credits' field to the UserAccount to support a dual-currency system (balance and credits). Added 'promotionalCredits' to track gifted credits for specific services.
